reviewText: For anyone who loved the Wii Play minigame Tanks!"
date: this game is its spiritual successor: from the art style and control scheme to the music
recommended:
this game borrows many of the features that made "Tanks!" great and expands upon them.

This review is for those of you who've played "Tanks!" and have been looking for a good PC equivalent ever since (as I have).
